raw akas.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea
Na pian xing kong na pian hai

akas: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (original title)
Na pian xing kong na pian hai
akas from release info: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (original title)
Na pian xing kong na pian hai

1.title: Intruder from the sea 1

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: A disruptive Lady Lu Li comes back to her birthplace, the Changle Town, with her brother Lu Xiao, who is appointed to administrate the marine affairs here. Lu Li cross-dresses herself and joins a shipyard, where she meets Wu Julan, a mermaid prince who visits the town for the purpose to investigate the mysterious disappearance of the mermaid priest.

2.title: Intruder from the sea 2

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: Wu Julan discovers the true sex of Lu Li, and Lu Li also finds out that Wu Julan has no identity. They agree to help each other to hide their real identities.

3.title: Intruder from the sea 3

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: Wu Julan and Lu Li fall in love with each other while the Changle town is approaching a crisis point as more and more mermaids living at the town are missing.

4.title: Intruder from the sea 4

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: Lu Li is found by her brother Lu Xiao, forced to go back home, and grounded without leaving a word to Wu Julan. The young lovers miss and worry for each other. They reunite magically at the Mid-fest's lantern fair, but Wu is attacked by Lu Xiao's entourage.

5.title: Intruder from the sea 5

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: Lu Xiao is angry at the love affair between Wu Julan and Lu Li.

6.title: Intruder from the sea 6

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: Lu Xiao sets up a trap to capture the mermaid group in order to build the mythic "Chang Mi" ship. To save his people, Wu, Julan was injured in the fight, and he refuses Lu Li's care.

7.title: The Lovers in the Storm 1

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

7.plot: Lu Li and Li Gengzhi co-operate with Wu Julan to rescue those kidnapped mermaids. They plan to destroy the mythic "Chang Ming" Ship.

8.title: The Lovers in the Storm 2

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

8.plot: With Lu Li's help, Wu Julan and his entourage successfully rescue the mermaid priest, and blow up the frame of the "Chang Ming" ship. Shortly after Wu Julan bids farewell and departs for his marine kingdom, a mysterious man come to the town, who contrives to exacerbate racial tensions between the human and the mermaid groups.

9.title: The Lovers in the Storm 3

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

9.plot: Mo Hen kills an innocent human boatman, and shifts the blame onto the entire mermaid group. Lu Xiao finds out his motives and invites Mo Hen to cooperate with him. Eventually mermaids are prosecuted from the town.

10.title: The Lovers in the Storm 4

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

10.plot: Lu Xiao forces Lu Li to marry her childhood friend Qing Hao. In front of Qing Hao, Lu Li refuses his confession, and declares her love for Wu Julan. The resentful Qing leaks a secret of the secret way in which Lu Li contacts Wu Julan.

11.title: The Lovers in the Storm 5

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

11.plot: Knowing that Lu Xiao's attempts to mermaid persecution, the sicked Lu Li risks her life and threatens Lu Xiao to revoke the persecution.

12.title: The Lovers in the Storm 6

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

12.plot: Wu Julan recognizes and identifies Mo Hen, a revengous royal blood exiled by his father, the mermaid king. Wu Julan clarifies facts to Qing Hao, petitioning him to revoke the persecution. On the other hand, Lu Xiao pretends to agree meeting the mermaid king and prince, but conspires with Qing Hao to assassinate them on the occasion.

13.title: The Lovers in the Storm 7

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

13.plot: Lu Xiao and Qing Hao ambushes the Mermaid King, and Wu Julan is put in prison. Lu Xiao tells the angry Lu Li that it was mermaids who killed their parents.

14.title: The Lovers in the Storm 8

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

14.plot: To save Wu Julan's life, Lu Li begs to Qing Hao and tells him that she is willing to marry him if he agrees to release Wu Julan.

15.title: Adieu to Love 1

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

15.plot: Wu Julan is rescued from execution at the last minute, but he is determined to see Lu Li again, and confesses his unchanged love for her. Having made an trade with Qing Hao, Lu Li lies that her promises and love for him are all set traps to revenge against the mermaid race.

16.title: Adieu to Love 2

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

16.plot: Heartbroken Wu Julan returned to his kingdom, and is punished for the credulity to believe the human race. His dying father wishes that the future king will learn to be indifferent to the human race.

17.title: Adieu to Love 3

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

17.plot: A mermaid girl goes to the human world for marrying her human lover, and she is going to violate the isolation law and hunt by her race.

18.title: Adieu to Love 4

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

18.plot: Wu Julan suddenly shows up in the Lu Li's wedding with Qing Hao, and snatches the bride away.

19.title: Adieu to Love 5

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

19.plot: Tortured by a mixed love-hate feeling, Wu Julan imprisoned Lu Li in his palace. On the other hand, Qing Hao sneaks into the Mermaid's kingdom for saving his fiance.

20.title: Adieu to Love 6

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

20.plot: Lu Li irritates Wu Julan when trying to release Qing Hao; however, Yin Hu reveals that Lu Li is indeed still in love with Wu Julan.

21.title: Adieu to Love 7

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

21.plot: Qing Hao returns to the human world and determines to attack the mermaids; the mermaid group thus shift their angers to Lu Li and requires the king to execute his beloved girl.

22.title: Adieu to Love 8

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

22.plot: Wu Julan intentionally allows Ying Hu to steal a medal that can authorize mermaid guards so she can rescue Lu Li from execution. Nonetheless, the angry mermaids still find them out and almost kill Lu Li, whom the mermaids witness that their king could sacrifice himself and die for. Wu Julan eventually releases Lu Li, and they promise to each other to mitigate conflicts between the humans and the mermaids.

23.title: A Mermaid's Secret 1

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

23.plot: Lu Xiao poisons Ming Zhu, and forces Mo Hen to help him again in exchange of the antidote. Begged by Lu Li, who has promised Wu Julan that she will mitigate the conflicts between the Humans and Mermaids, Lu Xiao pretends to agree and signs a declaration of cessation of hostilities towards the Mermaids. However, Lu Xiao plans out a bigger conspiracy against Wu Julan.

24.title: A Mermaid's Secret 2

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

24.plot: Threatened with Ming Zhu's life, Ho Hen leads Lu Xiao's army and attacks the mermaids' Imperial Ceremony. Witnessing this massacre, Wu Julan casts doubts on human's promise and determines to revenge.

25.title: A Mermaid's Secret 3

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

25.plot: Wu Julan sends his troops to attack the humans. Lu Xiao deliberately pretends to be hurt. Lu Li begins to shake her faith for Wu Julan. On the other hand, the Prime Priest advises her king that in wars, there are no winners.

26.title: A Mermaid's Secret 4

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

26.plot: Mo Hen disguises himself as an assassin from Wu Julan for murdering Lu Li. Lu Li eventually loses her trust for Wu Julan, and is convinced by Lu Xiao that the only way to protect the Changle Townspeople is to kill Wu Julan.

27.title: A Mermaid's Secret 5

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

27.plot: Lu Li uses the shell to call Wu Julan in the ocean. Even though knowing that it is a trap, Wu Julan could not resist but lands at Changle to see her. Lu Li has Wu Julan drinking the poisoned wine, stabs him in the stomach, while Wu Julan could have killed her in the same time, he fails to do it because he hadn't have the heart to hurt her. Lu Xiao's entourage shoots a deadly arrow into Wu Julan's chest. Wu Julan falls into water and loses consciousness.

28.title: A Mermaid's Secret 6

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

28.plot: Mo Hen and Ming Zhu make a lifelong commitment to each other; however, Lu Xiao continues to threaten their happiness with Ming Zhu's life.

29.title: A Mermaid's Secret 7

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

29.plot: Qing Hao investigates Lu Xiao and the murder case at the shipyard. However, Lu Xiao notices Qing Hao's intention and murders him.

30.title: A Mermaid's Secret 8

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

30.plot: Lu Xiao finally completes the construction of he mythic "Chang Mi" ship, and prepares to attack the Mermaid's Kingdom. As the worrisome Lu Li tries to notify the mermaids, she notices a mythical figure appeared in Wu Julan's tomb.

31.title: Epilogue 1

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

31.plot: Wu Julan is revived and attains immortality as well as an even stronger ability to control water and weather. He defeats Lu Xiao's army, and revenges on humans by creating tsunami to flood the Changle town.

32.title: Epilogue 2

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

32.plot: Lu Li finally gets to know Lu Xiao's conspiracy, and makes a complete break with her brother. Mo Hen promises to leave the town with Ming Zhu, but is stuck in the trap and in the end killed by Lu Xiao. Lu Xiao drinks Mo Hen's blood and attains his power.

33.title: Epilogue 3

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

33.plot: Wu Julan decides to sign a new peace agreement with the human beings, but the maniac Lu Xiao is still hostile to the mermaids. He kidnaps the pregnant Ying Hu, a mermaid girl who marries a human.

34.title: Epilogue 4

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

34.plot: Wu Julan finally marries Lu Li, but the maniac Lu Xiao never gives up his revenge. Accidentally, Lu Xiao kills his own sister. Wu Julan survives and stays alone. As time goes by, Wu Julan stays forever young and searching for his incarnated lover.

1.title: A Visitor from the Sea 1

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: To retrieve his magic pearl that was stolen by a friend in 1865, a thousand-year-old mermaid prince Wu Julan comes back to the human world in twenty-first century; he visits a small island and lives with a girl Shen Luo who is the offspring of that thief.

2.title: A Visitor from the Sea 2

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

3.title: A Visitor from the Sea 3

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: Shen Luo forces Wu Julan to play mermaid in a local parade.

4.title: A Visitor from the Sea 4

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: Violet's granddaughter Wu Liangliang shows up to play Wu Julan's psychiatrist, and helps to reveal the truth of Shen Luo's grandpa's death.

5.title: A Visitor from the Sea 5

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: Zhou Buwen incidentally finds out the secrets of Anzou and Wu Julan.

6.title: A Visitor from the Sea 6

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: Wu Julan presents his talent in fishing and sashimi cutting, and helps Sheng Luo to pay off her debt.

7.title: A Mermaid's Kiss 1

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

7.plot: Shen Luo falls from a cliff and is thrown into the sea. To save her, Wu Julan discovers that her body shines in the waters and is surrounded by fishes, which means that his magic pearl is inside Shen Luo's body.

8.title: A Mermaid's Kiss 2

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

8.plot: Violet tells Wu Julan that the only way to take back his magic pearl form Shen Luo's body is to have her true love's kiss. Thus Liangliang decides to help Wu Julan to run after Shen Luo.

9.title: A Mermaid's Kiss 3

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

9.plot: Liangliang asks Jian Yisheng to help Wu Julan chasing Shen Luo. However, Liangliang incidentally finds out that Shen Luo may have been dead in her childhood accident, and the magic pearl is sustaining her life.

10.title: A Mermaid's Kiss 4

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

10.plot: Zhou Buyan, who is jealous of Buwen's love toward Shen Luo, kidnap and chain her inside a container, in which the rising tides almost drown Shen Luo until Wu Julan saves her in time.

11.title: A Mermaid's Kiss 5

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

11.plot: After the incident, Wu Julan tries to teach Shen Luo how to swim, but Shen Luo is extremely afraid of water, and tells him that she was drowned and once declared of death in her childhood. Wu Julan learns the truth, and begins to turn her down because by kissing her will lead to her death.

12.title: A Mermaid's Kiss 6

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

12.plot: Shen Luo notices her abnormal behaviors and feelings toward Wu Julan and talks to Jian Yisheng, who diagnosed that she has completely fallen in love with Wu Julan.

13.title: The Ploy1

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

13.plot: Zhou Buwen tells Shen Luo that Wu Julan is not a human being.

14.title: The Ploy 2

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

14.plot: Wu Julan tells Shen Luo of his true identity and the obstacle, i.e., time, of their relationship. Shen Luo struggles for the fact that she will grow old but Wu will remains immortal.

15.title: The Ploy 3

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

15.plot: Shen Luo reveals her true feelings to Wu Julan, and they start a relationship.

16.title: The Ploy 4

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

16.plot: A journalist Michelle from New York visits the island, and tries to approach Wu Julan by declaring that she is the reincarnation of Wu Julan's lover back in 1865.

17.title: The Ploy 5

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

17.plot: Michelle tells Wu Julan that she is diagnosed with a brain tumor and dying, and acquires his magic pearl to save her life.

18.title: The Ploy 6

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

18.plot: Violet invites Shen Luo to New York by saying that her mysterious millionaire boss is interested in Wu Julan's cuisine.

19.title: The Secret Pearl 1

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

19.plot: Violet reveals that the identity of Wu Julan at the ball.

20.title: The Secret Pearl 2

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

20.plot: Anzuo beguiles Wu Liangliang of her trust, and has Violet to attend his father 's funeral, which brings Wu Julan into a crisis.

21.title: The Secret Pearl 3

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

21.plot: Shen Luo saves Wu Julan's life in time. Violet spills out to her the truth that Wu Julan will "leave" in a month. The heartbroken Shen Luo returns the island alone.

22.title: The Secret Pearl 4

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

22.plot: Wu Julan cannot forgets Shen Luo, and go back eyeing her surreptitiously.

23.title: The Secret Pearl 5

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

23.plot: As Anzuo gets to know that secret pearl is inside Shen Luo's body to keep her alive, he and Zhou Buwen plans to kidnap her.

24.title: The Secret Pearl 6

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

24.plot: Wu Julan raises high waves to defeat Anzuo, and kisses his princess to bring her back to life.

25.title: Last Days 1

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

25.plot: Knowing the fact that Wu Julan is dying, Shen Luo purposes to Wu Julan.

26.title: Last Days 2

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

26.plot: Zhou Buwen poisons Wu Julan in the wedding ceremony and forces him to transform in front of the guests and villagers.

27.title: The End 1

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

27.plot: Zhou Buwen plots a frame-up and accuses Wu Julan of murder, but the heartbroken Zhou Buyan exposes his lies.

28.title: The End 2

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

28.plot: Violet determines to retain Wu Julan's life, regardless of Wu's own will and Shen Luo's life.

29.title: The End 3

episode of.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea (TV Series 2017– )

29.plot: Wu Julan and Shen Luo spend their last day as if an ordinary couple, and go on a journey to destiny.

imdb.title: The Starry Night, the Starry Sea

production companies.name: Dream Stardom Film and TV Culture

plot: The romantic tale follows a girl living on a small island shelters and falls in love with a man from no where. The mysteries surrounding them gradually unravel his true identity, the ultimate end of an evolutionary process distinct from human beings.::melancholia
